name: Tank Ai Project
description:
Game realised during our studies at the Gaming Campus.

Goal was to learn AI coding and improve our coding in C# through Unity.

With this projet we've learn things such as :

  • Hierarchical Final State Machine
  • Behavior Tree
  • Using Asynchrone coroutines
  • Path Finding such has Dijkstra/A*/Unity Navigation

Game Realised by :

  • Floriand Jomain
  • Fraçois Calvet
  • Léo Chabert
